name: zeitgeist-subsquid
description: Zeitgeist chain block indexer and graphql server

scripts.db:reset: hydra-cli db:drop && hydra-cli db:create && hydra-processor migrate && hydra-cli db:migrate
scripts.docker:deploy: yarn db:up && yarn redis:up && rm -rf db/migrations/* && yarn db:reset && npm run db:create-migration -n 'init' && yarn db:migrate && docker-compose up -d
scripts.local:deploy: yarn db:up && yarn redis:up && rm -rf db/migrations/* && yarn db:reset && npm run db:create-migration -n 'init' && yarn db:migrate && npm run processor:start
